direction.raw_text: Written by Terry McKeown & Charles Gilliam May 26th, 2007 LONDON 2007.. NOW 1   EXT   NIGHT   URBAN TERRACE                                1 A row of rundown terrace houses. Some are boarded up. Not all the street lights work. Those that do cast shadows of parked vehicles glistening in the rain. A front door opens and DON appears with rubbish which he puts in a bin. He hears something and looks up to see four big horses pulling a hulking great wagon down the middle of the street. The wagon is a gigantic windowless box. The horses are harnessed and there are reins but no sign of a driver. It's a very weird sight. DON, unable to take his eyes off this amazing apparition shouts back into the house from where light from a TV flickers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carol!... Carol!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come here! Quick!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quick!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (irritated) I'm trying to watch this! It's the last episode!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (annoyed) Come here!!! CAROL appears in the doorway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it? But the wagon and horses have gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's gone! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 1   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the...! We now see what they see. The wagon has been converted into a stage. We're looking at an old fashioned and very shabby travelling theatre. Electric footlights are powered by a clanking generator. The pediment above the stage carries the words: THE ASTONISHING IMAGINARIUM OF DOCTOR PARNASSUS. PERCY, a dwarf, dressed as a medieval demon and rigged out as a one-man band plays a fanfare introducing a young man (ANTON, 18-19 years old) who emerges from the back of the stage dressed as MERCURY, the messenger of the gods, with wings on his helmet and sandals. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 4   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ladies and Gentlemen... Step up! Step up!... I, Mercury, the messenger of the gods, invite you... tonight, for one night only... at this very venue... to enter the mind, the very great mind, of Doctor Parnassus! PERCY does a roll on the drum as a curtain behind ANTON/MERCURY rises to reveal DOCTOR PARNASSUS - he appears to be an Indian holy man - long scraggly beard, chalk white make up, a large red circle on his bald head, a crown of yellow flowers, strings of beads, and partially covered in a loose-fitting swath of white cloth - apparently levitating several feet above the stage. (He's sitting on a glass plinth). DOCTOR PARNASSUS is seemingly in a trance. A bronze tripod containing burning incense stands beside him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doctor Parnassus... as old as time... yes, ladies and gentlemen, more than a thousand years old ... he has the power to empower your mind. A secret learned in the mystic East. Let Doctor Parnassus open your imagination. Let him guide and transport you to worlds and possibilities you never dreamt of... If you dare. But... Beware... there are dangers. You will have to choose. Will your soul fly?... Or will it be dashed on the rocks of darkness? The choice is yours and yours alone. Transcend the heights on Beauty's wing. A young woman, VALENTINA,(wearing a wig of long blonde hair and a white, flowing costume which gives her prominent hips and breasts) stands facing an elaborately framed full-length mirror nestled upstage amongst cut-out trees representing a forest... This is `Beauty'. She turns and steps forward. ANTON takes her hand. They make a couple of dance steps together. They look enchanting and enchanted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or, if you must... Now PERCY, in demon costume, leaps from behind the scenery . (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 4   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... scour the squalid depths with Putrid's brother, Stench! PERCY indicates a ticket dispenser attached to the front of the stage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take a ticket and join the queue! Only five quid a go! There's no greater bargain on planet earth! A beer bottle lands on the stage The DRUNKEN YOUTHS cheer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You choose... Fulfilment, grace and light or... Waste, filth and darkness. (under his breath, watching the drunk,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: with contempt) No prizes for guessing what you'll do. MARTIN has begun, with difficulty, to clamber onto the stage. His MATES laugh and shout encouragement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (not in character.. he stutters) No. Sorry. That's n-not allowed. You have to t-take a t-ticket first. ANTON tries to prevent MARTIN from getting on stage. But MARTIN thumps ANTON and pulls him into the `audience'. MARTIN'S drunken MATES laugh and applaud. MARTIN is now on stage and heading for DOCTOR PARNASSUS who is still in a trance. PERCY tries to head him off but MARTIN shoves PERCY off the stage. PERCY lands on the ground with a crash. More laughter from the MOB. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 4   CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (drunkenly to PARNASSUS) Hey you...I wanna audition. I wan... I wanna be a star... I wanna... MARTIN is on the verge of tweaking DOCTOR PARNASSUS' nose or pulling his beard when VALENTINA diverts him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop! Get off the stage! MARTIN turns his bleary focus to VALENTINA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thas a nice pair of jugs. MARTIN'S mates roar their approval.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get off the stage!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I wan you... I wan you... MARTIN lunges at `Beauty' who retreats up stage. MARTIN blunders into the scenery as he pursues `Beauty' who stays just out of reach. She takes cover behind a cut-out tree. ANTON and PERCY climb back onto the stage as MARTIN continues to chase `Beauty'. VALENTINA evades him by ducking through the mirror (made of flexible reflective material slit down the middle). MARTIN crashes after her. ANTON and PERCY exchange worried looks. They look at DOCTOR PARNASSUS. Should they wake him from his trance? They decide not to but it's a difficult decision. 5   INT/EXT   MAGICAL FOREST                                      5 The stage set, which was clearly only a few feet deep, now seems much deeper and to contain many more cut-out trees. `Beauty' weaves in and out of the 2 dimensional trees as MARTIN chases her further into the increasingly magical forest. Beauty's costume has been transformed into something wonderful. (A rainbow studded with diamonds?) VALENTINA comes into view. MARTIN is in hot pursuit. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 5   CONTINUED:                                                   5 MARTIN Come here you little sexpot! VALENTINA stops, turns, smiles sweetly and slams her fist hard into MARTIN'S gut. He doubles up. VALENTINA pauses for a moment, contemplating doing some serious damage, before striding off. MARTIN staggers to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come back! You bitch! He rushes after her but, trips on a root (a real 3 dimensional tree root) and pitches face first to the ground. Recovering, he looks up. Shock. He is surrounded by a dark, terrible, and very REAL forest. `Beauty' has vanished. 6   EXT   THE STAGE     NIGHT                                     6 VALENTINA, `Beauty', slips back on stage through the mirror. Her costume has reverted to its original state. She examines her knuckles on the hand with which she punched Martin. ANTON looks at her. She shrugs. DR. PARNASSUS is still in a trance, his lips moving soundlessly. ANTON watches DOCTOR PARNASSUS in awe. `Beauty' sighs. She's had enough. 7   INT/EXT   MAGICAL FOREST                                      7 MARTIN is lost and terrified in the dark forest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mum...Mum!... His voice echoes through the giant trees. But his cries are interrupted by another sound...a Tarzan-like howl. MARTIN spins around. Strange creatures are swinging on vines through the giant trees. They are all around him. They look like HANDS... with little heads and arms where the wrists should be. They are all howling and jabbering. From behind, a HAND CREATURE swings down and grabs MARTIN by the collar, hoisting him high into the air. Clearing the trees, MARTIN sees he is not alone. There are many other people - all in the clutches of HAND CREATURES swinging on "vines". (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 7   CONTINUED:                                                     7 But, the "vines" are actually long, slim tentacles... dangling from enormous, luridly coloured JELLYFISH that float through the dark, frightening, sky. From some of the tentacles, bottles of booze dangle - just out of reach of the struggling crowd - all desperate for a drink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please... I'll never...! Never again!. Honest!... From now on... I swear!.. Not a drop! With a smile of satisfaction, the HAND CREATURE stops jabbering and let's go of MARTIN'S collar. Down he plummets. The ground rushes up. MATRTIN is as good as dead. But when he hits the ground, rather than going SPLAT!!, he bounces high in the air, turns a couple somersaults and lands on his feet. He can't believe what has just happened... and then he hears music. Beautiful, ethereal music. In the distance a light is glowing. It's the sun, rising above a majestic mountain pass. Cut into the rock, is a long stairway winding up to the summit. The HAND CREATURE swings down, gives MARTIN the "thumbs up", and points encouragingly toward the stairway. Reformed and determined, MARTIN heads for the      stairs. But on reaching them he discovers that each one is 6      feet high. The stairway is ridiculously steep and difficult.      Letters are carved into the first stair..."THE 12X12 STEP      PROGRAM...GOOD LUCK". This is going to be tough. The sound of a honky-tonk piano makes him turn. Behind him the sky is dark. A roadside bar/nightclub with flashing neon lights has appeared. He hesitates. He could use a drink before the long climb. He heads for the club. The door to the club is opened by a mechanical fairground figure of a jolly smiling man (MR NICK) distinguished by a bowler hat and a red waistcoat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi there. C'mon in. Looks like you could use a drink. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 7   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (holding his head) Valentina...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (indignant) He was chasing me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (angry) You don't go through the mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had to get away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You hit him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Self defence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're out of control. Ever since your mother died...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I was three!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want to talk about it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (indignant) You brought it up! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 8   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't accept drunks!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We c-couldn't stop him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: People must be in their right minds when they make the choice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. I'm s-sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martin!... The POLICE are dealing with a drunken mob of nightclub REVELLERS, making arrests. A distraught, hysterical, DRUNKEN GIRL is looking for MARTIN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martin!... Martin!... She sees `Beauty'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He went with that cow! I'll scratch her eyes out! A POLICEWOMAN grabs the DRUNKEN GIRL and drags her, struggling, into police van. MARTIN'S FRIENDS are searching for him around the stage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Marty!? Marty, where are you? (a POLICEMAN grabs him)) Oi! Leave off..it's them..they've got our mate back there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You! Gunga Din! What do you think you're playing at!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: `Playing'? We don't `play'! What we do is deadly serious! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 8    CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gone. Will we miss him? I don't think so. The POLICEMAN looks and frowns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the POLICEMAN condescendingly) Don't worry if you don't understand it immediately. PERCY, wisely, decides to head off conflict. He steers DOCTOR PARNASSUS away from the POLICEMAN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to POLICEMAN) He's doing his bit to save the human race. He thinks it's got a future. Quaint, eh? I keep telling him to get a proper job. (shaking his empty collection cup) Check it out.. another night with nothing in the kitty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want you freaks out of here. Now. If I ever see you in this parish again I'll do you. DOCTOR PARNASSUS bows exaggeratedly, with a hint of mockery. The POLICE OFFICER suspects that DOCTOR PARNASSUS is taking the piss, but decides not to press it. Instead, he knees MARTIN'S struggling friend to the ground. 9    EXT   BACK STREETS DAWN                                       9 The sky is grey with the first light of dawn. The wagon rolls off down the dark street as a dustcart rumbles into view and its CREW begin emptying bins and picking up rubbish. 10   EXT   A HOLIDAY FAIR   NIGHT                               10 Shooting galleries. Music. Loud aggressive rides. PEOPLE milling around. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 10   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Step up! Step up! For one night only! The Imaginarium of Dr. Parnassus! Not to be missed! On stage is DOCTOR PARNASSUS, `levitating' and in a trance, as before. Incense smoke swirls around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Test your imagination! Envisage the sublime. Let Doctor Parnassus be your guide. Discover the heights of Wisdom... VALENTINA dances forward, looking fabulous as `Wisdom'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Or, if you will, visit the doldrums with all that's vile and stinks. PERCY steps forward, once again in his mediaeval demon costume.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take a ticket and wait your turn. Twenty quid a go, reduced to five for one night only!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The world is full of wonders, beauty, enchantment, for those with eyes to see... He magically produces a bouquet of flowers. Throws it into the air.. it transforms into beautiful doves. This impressive trick is totally ignored by a group loudly arguing just in front of the stage - THE FAMILY FROM HELL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mum... Mum... I want to go on the wall of death? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 10   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop going on, Linda! You're not old enough!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They won't let you, darling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I want to!!! I want to!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! DR. PARNASSUS stirs from his trance. He's had enough of this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me! Excuse me! Would you mind...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not fair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the fair, but it's not fair! UNCLE BOB laughs uproariously. LINDA pushes him into AUNTY FLO.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ow! Bloody hell! Diego - aged 9 and absorbed in his portable video game wanders away from the family.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! BEEHAVE YOURSELF! I'M WARNING YOU!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave her alone!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please! This is The Imaginarium! It requires respect, concentration... Kindly go elsewhere and take your detritus with you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is he insulting us? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 10   CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oy! PARNASSUS ignores him and resumes his trance. Unnoticed by all, DIEGO has somehow managed to climb onto the stage and is peering at the mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looking around) Diego!? Where's Diego?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !? VALENTINA turns her head just in time to see DIEGO vanish through the mirror. She starts to go after him, then hesitates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (trying to get ANTON'S attention) Pssst! ANTON looks across the stage to her. She mimes that a certain someone has gone into the mirror. ANTON considers waking DOCTOR PARNASSUS but thinks better of it. Instead he heads off upstage and through the mirror in pursuit of Diego. VALENTINA takes over the pitch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ladies and Gentlemen, let Dr. Parnassus be your guide... 11   INT/EXT   MAGICAL LANDSCAPE                                 11 ANTON moves through the cut -out trees and into a fantastic, brightly coloured landscape of Dr. Seuss-like hills and valleys. The sky if full of cloud-sized soap bubbles. Diego is in the distant using his game controller to make the bubbles bang into each other...trying to burst them. We can hear VALENTINA trying to continue the pitch in the face of the family from hell. Their baby has now started wailing. Cracks in the ground begin to appear under ANTON"S feet. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 11   CONTINUED:                                                   11 VALENTINA (V.O.) Beauty, Truth, Wisdom, Justice... without imagination all are dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! SHUT UP! The landscape, in response to DR. PARNASSUS' rage suddenly rips apart, fragmenting and spinning with ANTON inside it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!! DAMN AND BLAST!!! Things fly in all directions. 12   INT/EXT   MAGICAL LANDSCAPE                                   12 ANTON, recovering, struggles out from between giant blocks of stone. The world has gone dark. He hears DIEGO crying somewhere in the distance and starts to clamber over the shattered monoliths.. Reaching the top, ANTON sees DIEGO on the peak of a distant rocky pinnacle surrounded by bottomless chasms. There are what appear to be two suspension bridges spanning the void on either side of the pinnacle. CUT TO DIEGO who is in a state of confusion and terror. Is he lost inside a video game he can't control? He presses the buttons on his gaming device - to no avail. One of the bridges leads to a bluff where war games are under way... all very video-game-like. Thrilling aggressive music blares forth. MR NICK appears, still in red waist-coat and bowler hat, but this time in the form of a CUT-OUT shooting target with a bull's-eye on his chest. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 12   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on laddy, cross the bridge! Join up! Be a man. Kill the enemy. Impress your dad. Unlimited ammo. Great fun. Pow! Pow! Pow! As he speaks bullets fly. Each time MR.NICK gets shot and is knocked flat, he pops back up continuing his spiel. The other bridge appears to be made of black and white piano keys and looks very rickety and unsafe. The piano key bridge descends into a great cavern where hundreds of BOY AND GIRL PIANISTS are practising on hundreds of pianos, all playing the same tune - the tune DR. PARNASSUS is humming, but with stern, demanding, PIANO TEACHERS in attendance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, start again! Again! From the top! Again! Practice! Practice! DIEGO doesn't know what to do. Behind him rises a strange Mongolfier balloon. DR. PARNASSUS's face is repeated again and again around its circumference. ANTON'S in the basket. DIEGO catches sight of ANTON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Help! (indicating gaming device) It doesn't work! It's broken!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The game!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What g-g-game?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The game! The video game! The one we're in!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I d-d-don't know what you're t-t- talking about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Help me! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 12   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (miserable ) I c-can't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm n-not supposed to be here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What am I going to do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's the p-point. It's up to you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But... Don't leave me! Don't let me die! But ANTON has gone. DIEGO, terrified, tests the bridge to the war games.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Attaboy, sonny. Join the men. Nothing to it. Hup two, hup two... He hesitates...the music from the pianos seems to have an effect on him. He comes to a decision. He drops his gaming device then very hesitantly steps onto the extremely wobbly piano keys. The CUT-OUT shooting target MR NICK isn't happy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, wait! That's the wrong choice! That bridge leads to failure and despair. You'll be dead before you're thirty. This is the one. This is the bridge to manhood! DIEGO looks uncertain, unnerved. For a moment we think he might change his mind, but he presses bravely on across the piano bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 13   EXT   A HOLIDAY FAIR   NIGHT                              13 At last, finally, there's a bit of a crowd around the theatre, but drawn only by the FAMILY FROM HELL who are making a lot of noise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (hysterical) He's been kidnapped! They've taken him! It's that weirdo up there! Do something, Dad, do something!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want my brother! I want my little brother! On stage DR. PARNASSUS, continues to hum in his trance-like state. INSPECTOR OF FAIRS rattles on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You cannot perform here without appropriate authorization. Getting no response from DR. PARNASSUS he pulls out his mobile phone and dials.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (with phone to ear) It's me. I need some support. We've got trouble. ANTON steps out of the mirror. He produces an inflated balloon which he releases and which then flies, zig-zagging out over the audience. DR. PARNASSUS, wakes in time to see the balloon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (delighted with Anton's `message') Ha,ha! Success! One little devil out of the fire... makes it all worthwhile! He magically produces a Tarot Card from the startled INSPECTOR'S ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did you say you're from? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 13   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't. He lifts his arm with a flourish whereupon a gloriously painted canvas sky unrolls from the top of the set disgorging DIEGO as it reaches the stage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hooplah! DIEGO rolls out, tumbles across the stage and lands next to the rest of his FAMILY. He's beaming, laughing, full of wonder, transformed by his experience.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Diego! Where have you been? I've been worried sick!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And so... a glimmer of hope... Perhaps eternity has not been in vain!... DAD smacks DIEGO round the back of the head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you can wipe that silly expression off your face, you little poof.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're in big trouble! You're in big trouble!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've upset your mum.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's spoilt our evening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And where's your gamer? He's lost his bloody gamer! Another fifty quid down the drain. You're not getting another one! Bloody kids! Why do we bother? THE FAMILY FROM HELL moves off. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 13   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the trouble?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, the fuzz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did you say?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (charmingly) Fuzzy Wuzzy was a bear, Fuzzy Wuzzy had no hair, Fuzzy Wuzzy wasn't fuzzy wuzzy? The POLICE and the INSPECTOR exchange dark looks. Clearly they're dealing with a dangerous trouble-maker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Parnassus) Next time I find you doing business without a permit I'll impound your wagon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Parnassus) I'll be doing worse than that...now, bugger off!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With pleasure. He bows mock graciously. 14   INT   BACK STAGE   DRESSING ROOM   A MOMENT LATER           14 Valentina, half-undressed, is struggling out of her `Wisdom' costume while at the same time looking at pictures of beautiful homes and gardens in a very battered copy of `Homes and Gardens'. Without make-up and costume she appears much younger. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 14   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh! She turns, holding her dress to cover her modesty. There's nobody there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's that? Who's there? 15   EXT   EDGE OF FAIR / THE WAGON       CONTINUOUS              15 ANTON and PERCY are packing-up and closing the wagon. DR. PARNASSUS, out of his make-up and costume, is smiling and humming to himself as he removes the feed bag from one of the horses. The horse lifts its head and DR PARNASSUS recoils in shock and horror. Standing directly behind the horse is MR. NICK... a huge grin splitting his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello Parnassus... It's been a while hasn't it? PERCY, winding a rope onto a cleat, hears distant laughter and looks up. CUT TO PERCY'S P.O.V. where we see, some distance away and in a relatively secluded spot, MR NICK rocking with laughter while DOCTOR PARNASSUS looks stricken. He clutches at the back of a park bench to steady himself. CUT TO PERCY who looks thoughtful and worried. He heads off to help DOCTOR PARNASSUS as the latter slumps onto the bench. MR NICK has vanished.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's come to collect.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought so. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 15   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What can I do?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There must be something! He looks over to where VALENTINA is helping close the theatre. PERCY follows his gaze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're going to have to tell her. 16   EXT   CITY STREETS      LATER                             16 The wagon makes its way through city streets. PERCY is sitting on the roof driving. ANTON is lying on the roof looking up at the stars. VALENTINA is sitting next to him lost in thought.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at that moon. (no response from Valentina) I've n-never seen it so b-big. And the stars...It's so c-clear. PERCY holds his hand out, palm up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Valentina?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Val... Val.

PARNASSUS is slumped despondently on a cramped bed. A plate of untouched food sits on a table in front of him. He has laid out tarot cards. To the right - The Magus.. to the left - The Devil. direction.raw_text: ... I was visited... by someone I had hoped never to meet. In the distance, rising like a dark mountain, is a strange monastery. Dim light comes from a couple of windows. We can hear, from far away, the indistinct droning voice of the story teller, a younger DR. PARNASSUS. THE CAMERA moves up over and way ahead of the HOODED RIDER, continuing through the snowstorm, over fields, forests, valleys, rocks, until it reaches the monastery, high on a rugged hill. Here it enters one of the dimly lit monastery windows, taking us into a dining hall. 19   INT   MONASTERY DINING HALL    NIGHT                         19 Entering via a window and looking down into the monastery dining hall, we see DOZENS OF MONKS sitting at a long refectory table. They are eating their supper and listening to a young DR. PARNASSUS who is sitting on a dais at the far end of the hall, his eyes closed, in a trance, telling a story. A log fire burns in a big fireplace.

direction.raw_text: They'll know who you are. The MAN still doesn't move. ANTON reaches over and tries to find the phone in the MAN'S pockets. The MAN tries to push him off and find the phone himself. The phone is retrieved but, in the struggle to answer it, it's dropped. A WOMAN SPEAKING RUSSIAN can be heard from the phone. As ANTON and the MAN dive for it, the MAN `accidently' steps on it. The phone is crushed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pity.. I speak Russian. ANTON and PERCY glare with deep suspicion at the MAN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dammit! I told you to leave him. He was dead. DR. PARNASSUS, holding a cold, damp towel to his throbbing head, appears, coughing and miserable from the wagon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, we didn't and he isn't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was hanging under the b-bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hanging? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 30   CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (handing Parnassus the noose) By his neck. Until dead. If we'd had any sense. ANTON produces the bricks with strange markings that were in the MAN'S pockets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We found these in his p-pockets. DOCTOR PARNASSUS examines the bricks with great interest. He pulls out The Hanged Man card and compares it's arcane details - a noose, strangely marked shapes like bricks, a metal tube - to the objects found on the MAN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The hanged man!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is he okay? She appears from inside the wagon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to man) Are you alright?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes... thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to PARNASSUS who is in deep thought) He tried to kill himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With his hands t-tied behind his b- back? They all look at one another. Good point.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Actually, I saw that trick performed many years ago at....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: S-somebody was trying to k-kill him. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 30   CONTINUED: (4)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My God... that's exciting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We c-can't let him stay with us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why not?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We d-don't know what this is about, who he is, what he m-might have done...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (croaking) I haven't done anything. I'm sure. I hope. Please... Give me the benefit of the doubt. PERCY and Anton exchange knowing looks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (appealing to PARNASSUS) Father? DOCTOR PARNASSUS, looking up from his study of the bricks and noose, takes the MAN aside, looks closely, trying to read the strange markings on his forehead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These marks... I recognize them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (puzzled) Marks? The MAN wipes his hand across his forehead. Looks at his inky hand.. confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sotto voce) You've been sent by Mr Nick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (puzzled) Mr Nick?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (impassioned) Don't toy with me. Tell me you're an emissary from Mr Nick. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 30   CONTINUED: (5)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me you've come with a proposition. Tell me what I want to hear! TONY doesn't know what DR PARNASSUS in talking about but he grasps the fact that if he wants to be allowed to stay here he needs to play along.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank God! Thank God! Thank God for that! DOCTOR PARNASSUS takes PERCY aside, shows him the Hanged Man Tarot Card and indicates the MAN with a nod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's from Mr Nick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No he's not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's come with a proposal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No he hasn't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All is not lost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What proposal?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Father?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looking at the card, then to the MAN) You're welcome.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (croaking) Thank you. PERCY groans and tears his hair. VALENTINA is pleased. ANTON is not. VALENTINA kisses PARNASSUS on the cheek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 31   INT     DOCTOR PARNASSUS' DEN     A LITTLE LATER          31 The MAN precedes DOCTOR PARNASSUS in the tiny room. He looks around in amazement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can talk here. Sit down, sit down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. He does so. DOCTOR PARNASSUS sits opposite him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So... PAUSE MAN (trying to look on top of it) I like your study.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The message.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The message?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The message! What's the message? From Mr Nick. What does he want?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah... Well... That's the problem...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Problem? What problem?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Unfortunately... I've lost my memory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It'll come back. I'm sure. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 31   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've lost your memory?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just... it needs time... to recover.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've come here with a message.... A vitally important message from Mister Nick... A matter of life or death... and you can't remember what it is!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not at the moment. I'm sorry. It's never happened before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!!!! 32   EXT   SHOPPING MALL PARKING LOT    NIGHT                     32 The wagon is parked in a shopping mall parking lot. The theatre is being opened up by PERCY and ANTON. There are a few late night SHOPPERS coming and going. 33   INT   BACKSTAGE                THAT MOMENT                   33 VALENTINA, dressed as `Beauty', is rummaging in a theatre skip, helping the MAN find something to wear for the show. There is a slight whiff of sexual attraction in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He says you must work... to focus your mind. You can help out front.. sell tickets. Ah, here we are... (Pulling out a full bottomed wig) Try this. You can be `Justice'. The MAN tries on the wig and looks in a mirror. VALENTINA tries not to laugh. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 33   CONTINUED:                                                    33 MAN (pulling a face) Exactly. A laughing stock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just like the rest of us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I'll hide behind this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No face. No name. The mystery thickens. I'm going to have to give you a name... She presses a metal breast-plate to his chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... until you remember who you are, I dub thee Saint George. You can save me from the dragon. George.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold on!.. what dragon?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've met Parnassus. Mischievously, she ties a chiffon tutu around his waist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now you are making fun of me. VALENTINA giggles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry but, nobody laughs at me without paying the price....ah,ha. He begins tickling her. She laughs uncontrollably, falling backwards into the costume skip..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We c-can't do it. We... ANTON enters wearing his Mercury gear.       He freezes, seeing GEORGE and VALENTINA rollicking about.       They stop, look up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Anton.... what? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 33   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The show. We c-can't do it. It's your father...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it? What's happened? 34   INT   DOCTOR PARNASSUS' CABIN     MOMENTS LATER           34 VALENTINA and ANTON arrive in the doorway, dismayed. GEORGE hovers in the background. DOCTOR PARNASSUS is attempting to get ready for the show but he's so drunk he can hardly stand. He's already put some article of clothing on back-to-front or inside out. PERCY is trying to help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can he remember! (seeing Man in doorway) Can you remember?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bloody useless! Mr Nick sends an emissary and he can't bloody remember! It's a bloody disaster!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't go on. You're drunk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am not drunk! I'm under considerable stress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll have to do it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! No understudy! The audience won't tolerate an understudy! There's only one Doctor Parnassus, and I am he! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 34   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somebody make some strong coffee. EVERYONE looks at George.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Strong coffee? Brilliant! (sarcastically saluting George) This is why fate has brought us together. Don't worry about remembering... It's all the same to a man on a galloping horse! 35   EXT   SHOPPING MALL PARKING LOT    THEATRE                  35 DOCTOR PARNASSUS is on   stage, floating' on his glass pillar, apparently in a trance   but,humming erratically. He is flanked by VALENTINA and ANTON   who stay close to PARNASSUS in case he falls. PERCY is in his   medieval costume/one-man-band outfit. They all look uneasy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For one night only... raise your sights... encounter the majesty, the beauty, the miracle that's in each and every one of you. Take this opportunity to expand your horizons. It's not too late. Experience the Imaginarium of the great Doctor Parnassus. VALENTINA peers out over the `footlights' in the hope of catching sight of GEORGE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's George? He's nowhere in sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: P-probably remembered he had a wife or t-two back in Russia. VALENTINA gives him a dirty look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 36   INT   SHOPPING MALL SUPERMARKET     THAT MOMENT              36 GEORGE, wearing his `romantic' Venice carnival mask is smooth- talking several middle-aged LADIES on queue at the supermarket check-out. He's carrying the theatre's ticket dispenser.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three tickets for the price of two... That's a fantastic deal. It's a brilliant show. Much better than sex. Much ribald laughter from the flattered LADIES. 37   EXT   SHOPPING MALL PARKING LOT   LATER                      37 The shoppers have gone. The last car drives out of the car park leaving it empty except for the theatre wagon. ANTON, VALENTINA and PERCY are on their own. PARNASSUS, on his plinth, is asleep and snoring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank G-God... N-not a single customer!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's close up quick while the going's good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (amazed) He's never not done a show before... Maybe he's past it. (hopefully) Maybe it's time to retire. PARNASSUS groans in his sleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looking out front) Oh n-no! ANTON sees GEORGE heading towards them with a mob of MIDDLE- AGED WOMEN in tow. Bubbling with excitement, the mob arrives. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 37   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh look! How fascinating. The other WOMEN agree.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When does the next show start?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There isn't a next show. EVELYN and the other WOMEN are puzzled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've done all the shows we're doing here this evening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But we've got tickets. GEORGE looks hopefully at VALENTINA and ANTON who don't know what to say. We hear a crash. THE CAMERA PANS around. PARNASSUS has fallen off his perch and is now lying on the floor...snoring and mumbling. VALENTINA and some of the WOMEN run forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This man's drunk. Dead drunk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Disgraceful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's not drunk. He's got a bad cold....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But being a true professional he tried to keep going, at considerable risk to his health. VALENTINA and GEORGE exchange a quick look. VALENTINA thinks she's found a kindred spirit. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 37   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We want our money back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No problem...dear ladies. No problem at all. I'm so terribly sorry. I can't apologize enough. You can have your money back or, if you like... an extra free ticket. Better yet, two extra free tickets if you buy another ticket at half price. This offer is only available today. The WOMEN look on the verge of taking up the offer. ANTON and PERCY exchange looks. They can't believe GEORGE'S chutzpah. 38   EXT   CAR PARK     A LITTLE LATER                         38 The wagon rumbles across the deserted carpark. 39   INT   THE WAGON    THAT MOMENT                            39 A large pile of coins with quite a few notes mixed in tumble onto a table. GEORGE is emptying his pockets while VALENTINA and ANTON look on..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow! You took all that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got carried away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lying through your t-teeth can do that to you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anton!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (unperturbed) Most of them were coming tomorrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What tomorrow? We're gone. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 39   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, if it makes you feel better, I'll give it back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: N-no, keep it. Thanks to you we can afford to buy Valentina a b- birthday cake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's enough! ANTON storms off. GEORGE looks at VALENTINA sympathetically.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't be angry with him. He's a little bit jealous. He's young. Insecure. I'll make it my job to boost his confidence. VALENTINA smiles at George with admiration and approval.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When's your birthday? 40   EXT   SUPERMARKET CAR PARK         THAT MOMENT              40 As the wagon trundles out of the deserted car park a DARK FIGURE hops onto the rear platform. 41   INT   DOCTOR PARNASSUS' CABIN      MOMENTS LATER            41 DOCTOR PARNASSUS is groaning and clutching his head. He has a fierce hangover. He pours some powder from a packet into a glass of water, stirs it with his finger and knocks it back. He grimaces and shudders. A hatch/shutter on the small window behind him slides open to reveal the grinning head of MR NICK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You shouldn't drink, it doesn't agree with you. Startled, DOCTOR PARNASSUS spins around. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 41   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you want? I'll do anything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're man's lost his memory! He's bloody hopeless!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's not my man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tony Shepherd. Little toe-rag. He used to run a big charity. I wouldn't trust him. But then... you don't trust me do you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For God's sake! Tell me what you want!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just thought...seeing you so upset last night...that you needed a glimmer of hope...maybe a little bet?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On Valentina?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You bastard!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First to five?... You might win. And save her. What do you have to lose?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll kill you! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 41   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (laughs) Now that would be something. By her birthday then.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What! Impossible!..you've seen the business we're doing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Things are going to pick up. As sure as eggs is eggs. He closes the hatch/shutter with a bang.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait! Too late. He's gone. 42   EXT   DERELICT BUILDINGS     DAWN                           42 Back amongst the derelict buildings the Troupe is resting and doing chores. The horses are grazing. VALENTINA sits at a mirror fussing with various hair styles - slyly trying to catch GEORGE's attention. PARNASSUS, holding his aching head, sits a short distance away sadly watching her. PERCY is with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Five souls.. two days, eh!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shh! I'm trying to think.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you didn't I?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That he was a wrong-un. PERCY nods his head in George's direction. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 42   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trust in providence, Percy. Remember the hanging man. The cards don't lie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... but they sure as hell like being economical with the truth. CUT TO ANTON who is painting a long-stemmed, wooden flower...he comes over to VALENTINA with it in his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't talk to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: P-please...I'm sorry about last night. I behaved like an idiot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. ANTON suddenly plops down on his arse in a puddle of mud. Then spins, flips the flower high into the air and, rolling face down onto his stomach, catches the stem with his clenched buttocks. VALENTINA bursts out laughing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must admit... even idiots have their qualities. CUT TO GEORGE who is peeling potatoes, badly. PARNASSUS and PERCY come up behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: George... We'd like to know who you really are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?... Yes. Me too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I may be able to help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really? What?... How...? PERCY produces a small contraption with wires from behind his back and gives it to DR PARNASSUS. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 42   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold this piece of wire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You won't feel a thing. GEORGE takes the end of the wire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to put the tips of my fingers on the top of your head. He does so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want you to relax and try as far as possible to think of nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's not difficult... in my condition. DOCTOR PARNASSUS closes his eyes. He seems to be making an effort.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold your breath. GEORGE does so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very good, very good. Yes... Yes, I see... I see... Very interesting. DOCTOR PARNASSUS takes his hand from GEORGE'S head and gives the contraption back to PERCY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You may breathe normally. The effort seems to have tired PARNASSUS. He needs to sit down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What... ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alas, this technique has its limitations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But... Did you discover anything? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 42   CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (dramatically) Your name.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My name?... What is it? PAUSE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anthony Shepherd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (stunned) My God! That's it! You're right! Anthony Shepherd! They call me Tony. Tony Shepherd! That's who I am! VALENTINA and ANTON begin to pay attention and gather around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And... you used to do good works. Something to do with charity I think.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes...That's right! That's right! But how?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (dismissively) It's an ancient technique of mental divination, but I'm very rusty and it doesn't always work satisfactorily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But that's amazing! Brilliant! (oddly concerned) Was there anything else? DOCTOR PARNASSUS shakes his head, no.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (relieved) That's absolutely fantastic! Thank you. Perhaps I'll remember other things. PARNASSUS smiles and bows slightly ironically. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 42   CONTINUED: (4)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Charity work? I knew you were a good person.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what was he doing dangling under a bridge from his neck?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Percy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sarcastic) Oh dear, was that a rude question? Have I put my foot in it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's so strange. And horrible.. it's a complete blank. But I do remember I was involved in some sort of charity.. trying to do good, to make the world a better place, you know...inspire people, give them hope.... (self deprecatingly) What an arrogant idiot. VALENTINA looks at him thinking `what a sympathetic person.' The sound of a flutey whistle distracts him. ANTON is blowing a tune on the metal tube he found on the bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (with a superior air) Mozart's flute concerto in G.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, the pipe. Where did you get it? ANTON looks at the metal pipe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I found it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's mine. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 42   CONTINUED: (5)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. You're a musician n-now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not a musical instrument. May I have it?... Please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (teasing) Are you s-sure it's yours?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Positive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright. ANTON appears to offer the pipe to TONY but palms it so that when TONY reaches out to take it, it's gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's g-gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (getting shirty) Don't fool around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, there it is. TONY once more tries to take it. Once more ANTON makes it disappear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (angry) Give it to me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (derisively) Oooooh!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anton, that's enough. She steps forward, takes the pipe from ANTON and gives it to TONY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. DR. PARNASSUS, who's been watching this exchange, looks thoughtful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 43   EXT   THE WAGON      NIGHT                                  43 PARNASSUS and CO are preparing to move out and do a show. ANTON is working near PARNASSUS and PERCY who are unaware of his presence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's eating Anton? ANTON pricks up his ears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's in love with Valentina?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In love....?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It happens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The little snake! I'll skin him alive! CUT TO ANTON who winces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: While you're at it, don't forget the other one. DR. PARNASSUS looks at PERCY questioningly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The viper, the scorpion, the amnesiac boa constrictor. Tony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quite another kettle of fish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's ambitious, energetic... a man of destiny. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 43   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And he's going to help us win five souls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think he might. Valentina sees good in him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She'd be better off with Anton. CUT TO ANTON who's pleased.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perhaps I should offer her hand to whoever helps most in winning the next five souls. CUT TO ANTON who looks puzzled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's even worse than the other ideas you've had today.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not wrong... Ah, Percy, what would I do without you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get a midget. CUT TO ANTON as he moves, thoughtfully, away. 44   EXT   OUTSIDE PUB       NIGHT                              44 The theatre, parked outside a pub, is up and running. ANTON, as Mercury, is doing his pitch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sleep no more. Procrastinate no longer. Embrace this once in a life- time opportunity. Let the mind of Doctor Parnassus be the portal to the infinite world of your imagination. Behind the curtain, PERCY is signalling VALENTINA to see if DOCTOR PARNASSUS has been drinking. She sniffs him. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 44   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing? Please concentrate. We've got a tremendous amount of work to do tonight. A great deal depends on it. A roll on the drums from PERCY. The curtain rises. DOCTOR PARNASSUS `floats' above the stage on his glass plinth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As old as the universe itself, the great Doctor, versed in every mystic practice known to man, and many more besides, will guide you to your destiny. However, the AUDIENCE - a few PASSERS-BY and DRINKERS who have drifted out of the pub for a smoke - aren't much interested in ANTON. Instead they pay more attention to the masked TONY who, decked out in a stylish costume, is working the sparse crowd with his smooth charm. ANTON, irritated, glances back at DOCTOR PARNASSUS who is worried about the lack of customers. TONY is now surrounded by fascinated WOMEN. They laugh at one of his jokes. One pretty young woman, SALLY, in particular seems to be smitten by the handsome `actor'. TONY smiles seductively at her. The sight provokes ANTON. He leaps off the stage, grabs SALLY by the wrist and begins to pull her to the stage. PERCY keeps playing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?... Hey, what you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: T-taking you to the heart of your imagination! ANTON is trying to compete with TONY but just can't manage the charm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh my god! No way!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You won't regret it! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 44   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go for it Sal!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (indicating friend) Only if she comes with me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (enthusiastic) Now you're talking! A few ONLOOKERS cheer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: N-not at the same time! ANTON is still pulling SALLY onto the stage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not going on my own.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your imagination is a very special place. Doctor Parnassus will make it flower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I bet he will. More laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll do it together. More laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shakes his head) No. T-two c-competing imaginations in the Imaginarium at the same time... it's n-not advisable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The stronger imagination will overcome the weaker and then there's n-no knowing what might happen. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 44   CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's really stupid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let go!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: D-don't be afraid, d-dear lady. You'll be safe with me. Anton sweeps her off her feet and carries her onto the stage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put me down!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have no fear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She doesn't want to do it on her own!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only b-because she d-doesn't realize...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let go of her you silly pillock! VALENTINA, worried, steps forward to try and restrain ANTON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anton...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's alright! It's alright! Staggering under the weight of the struggling SALLY, ANTON barges into DOCTOR PARNASSUS' on his glass plinth. The plinth rocks and teeters. VALENTINA tries to stop it falling. ANTON, unaware of what he's done, disappears through the mirror as DOCTOR PARNASSUS crashes head first onto the stage. Crack! From behind the mirror comes the sound of a woman's terrifying, terrified screams. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 44   CONTINUED: (4)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! They've got her in there! That's her screaming! SAL! They doing something to her! SALLY! Help, somebody! Help! Save her! Upstage VALENTINA tends the stunned DOCTOR. He clutches his head in pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Father! Father! 45   INT/EXT   THE MIND OF DR. PARNASSUS   THAT MOMENT            45 Terrified, ANTON and the screaming SALLY are spun through a black void clinging desperately to an asteroid as planets and stars spin madly around them. Blood-red lightning bolts crackle and crash. Chaos. 46   EXT   OUTSIDE PUB   THAT MOMENT                              46 Out front, the CROWD, larger now, is reacting badly to the dreadful screams. Sally's friends try to storm the stage. TONY and PERCY try to hold them back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please. Everything's alright. It's okay. Really. I promise you. A MIDDLE AGED WOMAN hits him with her handbag. TONY and PERCY are in danger of being overwhelmed. We can still hear Sally screaming from somewhere within the stage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ladies and gentlemen. Ladies and gentlemen....please... A DRUNK takes a swing at PERCY, misses, and connects with TONY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ugh! He falls off the stage and disappears into the angry CROWD who begin pummelling and kicking him. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 46   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somebody call the police! A battered TONY, chased by the enraged crowd,just manages to clamber on board, with the help of VALENTINA. The wagon narrowly succeeds in out-pacing the fastest of the CROWD. As it disappears down the street, a figure is dumped unceremoniously out through the back door of the wagon. It's the terrified SALLY, sent sprawling in the middle of the road. A figure steps out from the shadows to help her to her feet. It's MR. NICK in his bowler and red waistcoat. 47   EXT.   RUBBISH TIP      NIGHT                                47 A police siren howls as the wagon comes crashing around the corner of a great rubbish tip and clatters to a halt... the horses steaming, sections of the theatre hanging loose, broken..an utter mess. The siren fades into the distance. 48   INT/EXT   THEATRE/WAGON      NIGHT                           48 Amongst collapsed scenery PARNASSUS lies in a heap. The others are struggling to their feet. ANTON is desperately trying to do something useful to help PARNASSUS but, VALENTINA pushes him out of the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What were you thinking? Look what you've done. Get out of the way! (appealing to Tony) Tony. TONY, battered and bleeding, helps her lift PARNASSUS and manoeuvre him to his room. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 48   CONTINUED:                                                   48 ANTON is mortified.      PERCY pats him on the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Better luck next time. 49   INT    PARNASSUS' ROOM    NIGHT                               49 TONY helps VALENTINA get PARNASSUS comfortable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is my punishment. All is lost. First to Five. One down. Impossible, Valentina. First to five. One down. No people. No time, Valentina. We are doomed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ssshhhh... Thanks, Tony. Leave us. TONY, nods, leaves slowly. Listening. 50   EXT.    WAGON    NIGHT                                        50 PERCY is angrily banging about, trying to repair the damage. ANTON is trying to help but, is just getting in the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do me a favour. Take a long walk off a short pier. TONY arrives.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I help?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bugger off! TONY finds ANTON sitting despondently a short way from the wagon swigging from a bottle. He sits down next to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: L-leave me alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What were you doing to that girl behind the mirror? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 50   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you suggesting?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, c'mon...we all heard her screaming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was screaming as well.   It was t- terrifying...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Terrifying? Why? I don't understand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, well...you wouldn't. You've n- never been inside the D-Doctor's mind have you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your not trying to tell me that mind control stuff is real?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think it's some k-kind of scam, d-don't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Isn't it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... But I d-don't expect you to g- get it... N-not in a million years.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on.. if he can really control people's minds, why isn't he ruling the world? Why bother with this crappy side show?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He d-doesn't want to rule the world d-does he?... He wants the world to rule itself!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What a waste... Tell me about the mirror. What's the point of that, if not to razzle-dazzle the public? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 50   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're way off the mark. (taking a swig) It's a b-bloody great mystery... wrapped in a b-brown p-paper b-bag enema...or do I mean, enigma... He pulls himself up and starts to stagger off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Er... one more thing....Does `first to five' mean anything to you? ANTON looks at TONY with loathing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought you were the c-clever one. He walks away into the darkness. TONY sits there busily thinking. 51   EXT    RUBBISH TIP    DAWN                                51 The morning light suffuses mountains of domestic refuse. Rubbish for as far as the eye can see. Plastic sacks of various colours, many spilling open. A few fires are burning. Flocks of scavenging sea gulls hover and dive, screaming blue murder. On one of the many pinnacles of garbage sits a lonely figure. It's ANTON, depressed, angry, forlorn. The CAMERA SWINGS ROUND to show, below ANTON, in a valley of waste material, the wagon. 52   EXT.   THE WAGON     DAWN                                 52 PERCY has spread out the broken scenery assessing the damage. In the shadow of the wagon VALENTINA is changing TONY'S dressings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank God it's only cuts and bruises. I thought we'd lost you. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 52   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you hadn't been there... He holds her hand.    Looks deep into her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Valentina, your father seems in a terrible state. Is it the police? The show? Maybe I can help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what's wrong with him, but if it's about the show...I don't care. I'm tired of it...let the police arrest us. I'm sick of living like this.... She looks miserable. TONY puts his arms around her.   Holds her tightly to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't say that. What you're doing is important. Really important. It's just... maybe... it should be done in a different way. He is about to kiss her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What sort of "different" way do you suggest? DR. PARNASSUS, grim faced, head bandaged, steps from behind the wagon. TONY and VALENTINA quickly disengage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, hello, good morning sir. How are you feeling? That was a nasty bump on the head you got..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Different?"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, sir, I've been thinking... It's clear the show's not attracting many people. Forgive me but... I see two ways of tackling this problem. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 52   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Either the style of the show is at fault... or the type of audience. I would suggest changing both. PERCY has appeared, dragging a damaged flat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Change the show!? Who the fizzing hell do you think you are?......
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shhh! He sits down heavily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry but.. you're not modern. People want modern. Look. He holds open a tattered fashion magazine to a page of beautifully photographed models in a fabulously magical setting. He thumbs through more pages of dreamy images.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is modern. It works. Trust me, I understand this world. (with a wink) This kind of mind control. Let's try to meet the public halfway.. the right public.. and in a better part of town. From behind the wagon ANTON watches forlornly.   Alone and unnoticed by the others.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about the filth?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (puzzled) What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The filth. The police.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There'll be a better class of police too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That'll be the day. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 52   CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The trick is not to hide. Change your colours. Be bold. Go where they would least expect to find you. I think we have been brought together for a reason. I don't believe in coincidence. You saved my life. Now let me do something in return. PARNASSUS confers with PERCY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our time's nearly up... This could be what we need.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This can be my birthday gift to Valentina. VALENTINA smiles and nods to PARNASSUS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well then... (with a burst of energy) For God's sake let's do it!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, okay, but what exactly do we do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... First of all, I want you to give me your money. All of it. What?!   PARNASSUS, PERCY, and VALENTINA look at each other. Then PARNASSUS sees something beyond the wagon...ANTON, downcast, heading off through the swirling plastic bags and flying rubbish... a battered suitcase in his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anton!   Where are you going? No answer from ANTON. VALENTINA runs after him but, he marches on silently. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 52   CONTINUED: (4)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing? Didn't you do enough damage last night? (pummmelling his back) Anton... I'm the one who wants to run away! (he slows) Are you trying to wreck my birthday, or what? Anton stops, still not looking at VALENTINA he slowly drops his suitcase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please. We need you. Moved, ANTON turns to her.   She smiles sweetly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much money have you got? 53   EXT   BOND STREET   EVENING                                  53 Close up on Parnassus's glass plinth..now open-topped and sitting on the edge of the stage... full of the troupe's savings. A sign proclaims "Please Take Generously" Directly behind the glass box is a half-globe with the continent of Africa featured. Sitting on top is Percy playing something ethnic but tasteful on a flute with one hand...his other is held out pathetically... a beggar. He's blacked up and dressed in rags. He doesn't look happy. He sneaks nervous glances at the glass box of money. The wagon, newly painted in sleek and stylish black and white, stands in Bond Street or some similarly fashionable street with expensive shops and art galleries. RICH WOMEN anxious to be conspicuous in their consumption of wealth glide past. New signs proclaim `The Choice Is Yours' `The Imaginarium - More Exclusive than ever'. The stage, hung with soft,flowing, gauzy fabric, has been chromatically divided in half - one side black, the other white. On the dark side a bloated, sun-glassed woman consuming vast quantities of food reclines on an elaborate lounge. She is, in fact, a very uncomfortable ANTON in full and fulsome drag. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 53   CONTINUED:                                                    53 Center stage stands DR. PARNASSUS dressed as a stylized doctor with head reflector. In his hand is a staff with an elaborate sun on the top. He is blindfolded. On the white side of the stage stands the mirror and a stylized Tree of Knowledge with bright red apples. Under the tree, and reflected in the mirror, sits VALENTINA as Eve...naked except for a long wig that maintains her modesty. She gracefully combs her hair. Above the mirror is a sign proclaiming "The Naked Truth". DR. PARNASSUS, peeking under his blindfold, is distinctly uncomfortable by his daughter's lack of attire. TONY, in a beautifully cut white suit, and wearing his `romantic' Venetian carnival mask sits in profile in a dreamy pose on the edge of the white side of the stage. Nobody speaks. They pay no attention to the crowd. A few women stop, curious. One of them takes out some money and puts it in the glass plinth and turns to go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me, madam. I'm afraid we can't accept this. The woman stops, confused. Tony hands her back her money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are here to give...not take. We are here to help those in need. If it's money you need, then here it is. (referring to the glass plinth) If it's the flowering of the soul you need, then here we are but, unfortunately we are booked solid at the moment. But thank you.. I can see you have a generous spirit. TONY returns to his pensive pose.    The women look at each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me but, how does this work? What does it cost? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 53   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cost? Money is no good in the Imaginarium.   This is a refuge for hearts in need of truth. A place for souls to be purified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long does that take?   I'm running late.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Madam, why should you care about time? What are your dreams worth in minutes? The women grow pensive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are hard choices to be made in life. (he indicates the tableaux) What about the dreams of the less fortunate in the world. Do you have time for their dreams? Or are you like I once was...do you just despair? Despair at all that is wrong in the world.. (getting to his feet) ...despair at your inability to do anything to change it.. to make it better...I despaired so much at the powerlessness of my own existence that I took the easy way out...the coward's way...I committed suicide! Yes, that's right, I killed myself. Can you understand my despair? But I was saved...saved by a miracle...The Imaginarium...and Doctor Parnassus. He brought me back from the dead. He gave me a new life. A reason to live. He has given me power to dream again... to dream of a better world. During his speech, more and more people have gathered. Some are actually weeping. They are press forward putting money in the plinth. Tony tries to stop them but, they insist. VALENTINA, ANTON, PERCY, and DR. PARNASSUS are astonished by TONY'S performance. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 53   CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop pushing!/Excuse me, can one make a booking?/Are you taking bookings?/Stop pushing at the back!/Form a queue!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, I'm sorry but, we're booked solid at the moment. A Louis Vuitton-dressed woman (60+ years old)at the back of the crowd shouts:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that child up for adoption? She points at the blacked up PERCY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to adopt that unfortunate black child. It shouldn't be working like this. It should be in school. PERCY is appalled.
direction.name: direction
