direction.raw_text: Who's in charge here? The LOUIS VUITTON WOMAN looks around as a couple of POLICE OFFICERS arrive on the scene. TONY spots them too and heads off the LOUIS VUITTON WOMAN as she makes towards them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Madam, congratulations, you have been chosen. The other WOMEN gasp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come forward and enter the Imaginarium.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But, I haven't paid. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 53   CONTINUED: (4)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't want your money. We want your hopes and dreams. You may make a donation later, if you wish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a rare moment. Very few are chosen. Don't miss this once-in-a- life-time opportunity. This way. Please. He ushers the uneasy LOUIS VUITTON WOMAN onto the stage and guides her upstage. PARNASSUS goes into his trance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Believe me Madam, you're the luckiest woman in the world. The LOUIS VUITTON WOMAN steps into the mirror. TONY hesitates..a moment of uncertainty. VALENTINA encourages him with a smile. He steps through. Across the street a clock begins striking the hour. CUT TO the two POLICE OFFICERS who start to move the crowd and show on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, I think it's time to move on, folks. But on spotting the naked VALENTINA who winks at them, they agree between themselves to give the show a bit longer. 54   INT/EXT   IMAGINARIUM                                        54 TONY and THE LOUIS VUITTON WOMAN are astonished to find themselves in the romantic, soft-focus, pastel-colour setting of a soothing, sophisticated, shampoo commercial. Soft fabrics waft, cleansing waterfalls cascade, rose-petals float through the air, beautiful girls swing from swings attached to clouds - all in delicious slow motion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (overcome) Oh... how gorgeous... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 54   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ohhh... What bliss... and I don't even know your name...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tony...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tony. How dashing. A bar or two of tango encourages them to take a couple of intimate tango dance steps. Now gently wafting curtains part to reveal.. down a flower strewn path and over a bridge... a sleazy motel with a shingle over the door reads: "The One Night Stand Motel". In the office window sits MR. NICK LOUIS VUITTON WOMAN (CONT'D) Oh, goodness me! She bats her eyelashes at TONY and begins, knowingly, to pull him towards the motel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I'm not wrong, I fear you must go alone. THE LOUIS VUITTON WOMAN pouts playfully, pulling him onwards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why would I want to go without you darling?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's one of the rules... One imagination at a time, free from the influence of another.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boring. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 54   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh..look... another possibility.. Below them a gondola rests in the stream as small, flower bedecked barques float past with framed pictures of romantic heroes who died young; Keats, Shelly, Byron, James Dean, Rudolph Valentino, Marilyn Monroe, Buddy Holly, Princess Diana... the stream continues off into the distance to a dark, towering Egyptian pyramid. TONY is as bemused as THE LOUIS VUITTON WOMAN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must make a choice...and... actually, to be honest, I'd strongly recommend this one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But... Rudolph Valentino, James Dean, Princess Di?... all these people... they're dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (thinking fast) Exactly. To be reborn, first you must die. All of them have achieved a kind of immortality. And we love them all the more for it. They won't get old or fat. They won't get sick or feeble. They are beyond fear. They are forever young. They are gods. And you can join them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (softening) You're such a wonderful speaker. The gondola awaits....with a beautiful male model at the helm. THE LOUIS VUITTON WOMAN smiles at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's not a moment to lose. But as she hesitates a dark shadow rises over them. TONY, looking past the WOMAN"S shoulder, sees the dark waters of the stream rise up transforming into a GIGANTIC KING COBRA that towers menacingly over them. It's wearing a BOWLER HAT... and it's angry. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 54   CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But your sacrifice must be pure. You have to let go of all these worldly goods. He helps THE LOUIS VUITTON WOMAN remove her necklace, earrings, bracelets, rings, broach, in double quick time and guides her onto the gondola, blowing a kiss after her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remember nothing is permanent... not even death. He turns back to see the GIGANTIC KING COBRA shrinking back below the bridge, transforming itself back into the waters of the stream. From under the arch of the bridge hangs a rope. At its end.. a hangman's noose. TONY stares at it darkly disconcerted. 55   EXT.   STAGE     EVENING                                  55 TONY re-enters the stage through the mirror, looking at DR. PARNASSUS who has just come out of his trance with astonishment
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was so... I had no idea... It's just... incredible. ...And then he realizes the clock is still striking the hour realizing that only a few moments have passed since he entered the mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ..how do you do this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hooplah! The LOUIS VUITTON woman reappears, sitting on a cut-out cloud descending from the ceiling of the stage. She looks radiant. She is weeping, completely overcome by her experience. PARNASSUS steps forward and helps her to her feet. She kisses his hands in gratitude. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 55   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, thank you, that was so beautiful, I feel so... thank you so much...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank YOU, dear Lady, you give me strength to continue Born again, tearful but transcendent, the LOUIS VUITTON WOMAN produces her cheque book and begins to write a cheque. TONY is frozen, confused. The crowd is still... stunned by the LOUIS VUITTON WOMAN's transformation as she deposits the cheque, her handbag, her expensive coat in the glass box and glides benignly through the crowd... which parts in awe. Pause... and then the other WOMEN rush the stage. Mayhem is narrowly averted as TONY and PERCY manage to coral them into a more-or-less orderly queue. Across the street, standing in the doorway of a shop selling luxury goods, is MR NICK. He watches events, intrigued... ...as TONY escorts a second woman through the mirror, and a third, they descend, ecstatic, emptying the contents of their handbags, their pearls, earrings and diamond rings into the glass box. TONY pays off the cops who move on. TONY, getting more and more flamboyant, forgets to lower his mask each time he re-enters the stage. And now a fourth woman descends. Four successes for DOCTOR PARNASSUS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One more to go and we're free. DOCTOR PARNASSUS spots MR NICK across the street, smiles, holds up four fingers. MR NICK gives a little `I'm not impressed' smirk and turns away and pretends to be interested in the luxury goods in the shop window as four large dark heavy RUSSIAN MEN, all laden with luxury shopping walk past. One of the RUSSIANS stops..looking at the show..at TONY whose mask is sitting on top of his head. The leading RUSSIAN pulls him on. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 55   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon..What are you watching that crap for.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pointing at TONY) It's him!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are you talking about? (following SERGE's pointed finger) Impossible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sure. They start pushing through the crowd. TONY, reaching down to help an elderly lady up to the stage, looks up and sees the RUSSIANS heading through the crowd.. Panic!! He pulls the mask down and begins to back up. But it's too late, they've definitely seen him. He spins around and rockets upstage, past DR. PARNASSUS who is deep into his trance. TONY dives through the mirror much to the amazement of VALENTINA, ANTON, PERCY. The RUSSIANS chase after him, shoving the queuing WOMEN aside, smashing the scenery and knocking ANTON into the wings. 56   INT/EXT   SHAMPOO COMMERCIAL LANDSCAPE                    56 The RUSSIANS charge through the shampoo-commercial landscape. No TONY.. Just slo-mo fashion models and soft wafting fabrics and aromatic breezes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did he go?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You tell me... It can't be him. He's dead. We killed him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So why did he run? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 56   CONTINUED:                                                     56 GREGOR (IN RUSSIAN) There he is!! In the distance, TONY is hiding behind some billowing fabric. On being spotted, he takes off up a hill. The RUSSIANS race toward the hill only to crash into a solid wall - painted as a landscape with TONY frozen in mid stride. Looking off to their right they see Tony heading up another hill. But as they rush in that direction another wall rises up blocking them. Again it is painted with a hill and TONY frozen in midstride. A third and fourth wall rise up.. surrounding and trapping the RUSSIANS. There is a cell door in one wall. Like crazy animals they start throwing themselves against the door trying to break it down. It won't budge. While the others batter the door, GREGOR, who has been somewhat affected by the soft shampoo commercial world, sits quietly in a corner picking pretty flowers. Exhausted, the other RUSSIANS collapse on the ground. GREGOR gently breathes in the aroma of the flowers and exhales. As he does the door swings open. The other RUSSIANS gape at him... then barrel out the door. Outside is a new, beautiful, landscape - the sky dotted with white fluffy clouds. Extending from the ground to each cloud is an incredibly long ladder. On each ladder is a person climbing upwards. The RUSSIANS spot Tony. He is already a hundred feet up a ladder and climbing. Unfortunately, their way is blocked by an over-bright, hyper- active, wide-eyed sales girl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi! Hello! Today's special! Reach for the clouds! Discover your true potential! Gift certificates are available at... The RUSSIANS roughly shove her aside.     As they rush past, GREGOR pauses, hands her his flowers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Relax...smell the flowers. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 56   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You thieving scumbag! We break every bone in your body! They scrawl strange symbols on TONY'S forehead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Wait! I can explain! Give me a chance!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We want our money or you die again! This time for good! ANTON struggles to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop it! L-leave him alone! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 56   CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stand b-back! I'm warning you! Foolishly, he whips off his wig and assumes a manly martial arts pose. The RUSSIANS look at each other. Then, utterly ignoring ANTON, turn their attention back to beating TONY. GREGOR walks calmly over to ANTON who is in attack mode.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (bending down and picking a flower, he offers it to
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Relax. Smell the flowers. Confused, ANTON takes the flower, sniffs and then... GREGOR floors him with a powerful punch on the nose Meanwhile, the RUSSIANS have a noose around TONY's neck and have looped the rope over a tree branch. TONY struggles to pull out the metal pipe he keeps on a string around his neck. He gets it to his mouth as if to swallow it when... ... the ground erupts and a giant London policeman's helmet rises up (we are talking 20 feet tall)and revolves - revealing DR. PARNASSUS' carved and painted face beneath. The mouth drops open and a great red tongue rolls out like a welcoming red carpet. From inside the giant mouth a smiling policeman beckons the RUSSIANS to come on in.. The terrified RUSSIANS let go of the lynching rope. TONY drops to the ground and, with a whistle, the brass pipe flies out of his mouth. Behind the RUSSIANS a painted backdrop unfurls..it reads "JOIN THE FUZZ.. WE LOVE VIOLENCE".. and a chorus line of LONG-LEGGED GIRLS in mini-skirted police outfits appear - high-kicking a snappy song and dance number. The astonished RUSSIANS don't know what the fuck is going on. Suddenly, a friendly OLD WOMAN'S VOICE is heard shouting something in Russian. Spinning around, the RUSSIANS see an old BABOUSHKA (Russian grandmother) outside a tumble-down cottage waving gaily to them. A stunned pause. Then, pell-mell, they rush to her. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 56   CONTINUED: (4)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mama!   Mama! Help! Save us! As they run toward her they get smaller and smaller. She lifts her skirts and all four disappear underneath. And then.. BOOM!.. a muffled explosion balloons the skirts outward. Smoke spews out from below. Straightening her skirt, the BABOUSHKA looks up, and pulls off her head - revealing MR.NICK's tiny head poking out of the collar. He smiles smugly. The giant POLICEMAN DR. PARNASSUS registers disappointment and, like a balloon rapidly deflating, spins off into the sky sending up a cloud of dust obscuring everything. The dust clears and TONY and ANTON find themselves in a desolate, empty landscape. Nowhere. Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you see me!! I almost reached the clouds! I could have...it was incredible...I was almost there...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up! Over a distant rise the wagon appears, pulled by the horses. ANTON drags Tony, babbling and stumbling, towards it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I made my choice and I climbed... I felt so much potential. I could have done anything. I have to have another chance...another go...I need this... 57   EXT   SOMEWHERE DOWN RIVER - MUD FLATS   EVENING             57 The wagon is parked on waste ground. It looms out of nowhere illuminated by a light leaking from within. We hear PERCY'S angry voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe you were holding them upside down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 57   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That cards! The bloody Tarot cards!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enough, Percy! Enough!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I made a mistake. A big mistake. I know that and I'm sorry. 58   INT   THE STAGE - CONTINUOUS                                58 The angry troupe huddles amongst the clutter of props and jumbled scenery. TONY is on trial. DR. PARNASSUS is sitting in a corner, head in hands. He seems utterly destroyed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a l-liar. You've been lying to us all along. Who are you? Who were those thugs?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am not a liar!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! I just... didn't divulge everything I knew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Comes to the same thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Absolutely not. Not in law.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You stole their money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I didn't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what they said. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 58   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you going to believe them before you believe me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why not?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because they're irredeemably bad people, and I'm essentially good. I know that sounds terribly prim and arrogant and self righteous, but I'm trying to be honest. Look, the truth is... in order to get my charity off the ground I needed capital. ANTON looks askance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I know, and you're right, but that's the way the grown-up..the real world works. You can't make omelettes without soiling your hands. Or should that be the other way round? Anyway, I - with hindsight very foolishly - accepted a loan from people who seemed to me, at the time, to be very decent and sincere. There was absolutely no way I could have known that they were part of a ruthless organised crime syndicate and that they wanted to use my charity to launder money. I made a mistake. And I have to live with that. I'm sorry. What more can I say? VALENTINA wants to believe TONY. ANTON and PERCY don't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh Tony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But, can we not talk about me for a moment.. I want to thank the Doctor for letting me experience the most sublime, inspiring .... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 58   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So why were they trying to k-kill you? "Again!" is what they said.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (answering his own question) The first time they hung you from the b-bridge... right?... B-because you stole their money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop saying that! I didn't steal it! I didn't have it. I'd had to invest in infrastructure. I needed more time. When you run a charity you have to give lots of money away. You wouldn't believe the red tape. The Charity Commission are a bunch of fascists. It's incredible. I mean... c'mon give me a break...I almost died today.. and I said I'm sorry... and anyway..... this was supposed to be a special day...it's Valentina's birthday. He pulls out the LOUIS VUITTON WOMAN'S beautiful necklace from his pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Happy birthday. For a beautiful woman. He puts it around Valentina's neck. VALENTINA smiles.   ANTON glowers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The marks on your face...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Marks?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They scrawled something on your forehead. Symbols... Signs... TONY looks uncomfortable, tries to rub his forehead clean. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 58   CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You had some of those when we rescued you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, what's that about? But, before he can say anything, there's a knock on the door which startles everyone. They exchange looks. DR. PARNASSUS is frightened but hides this from the others. The knock is repeated. PERCY starts to get up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sotto voce) No! Leave it! PERCY sits down. The knock comes again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sotto voce to the DR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sotto voce) It's too late... for visitors. Once more someone knocks. Everyone is edgy. Particularly PERCY. The knock comes again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sotto voce, agitated) Please can we answer the door? I can't stand not answering the door, or the telephone, or whatever. It's not in my nature. I won't sleep for weeks if we don't answer the door! Sorry! DR. PARNASSUS gets up, goes to the door, opens it and steps outside, closing the door behind him. VALENTINA, ANTON, PERCY and TONY exchange looks. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 58   CONTINUED: (4)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (embarrassed) Sorry, I just... I've got a thing about... 59   EXT   OUTSIDE THE WAGON    THAT MOMENT                       59 DR. PARNASSUS and MR NICK move away from the door and go around to the front. The stage is half-opened. The horses are standing steaming nearby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (very down) I know... It's over....you've won...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Four rotten Russkies?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And the girl..from the pub. MR NICK shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sally doesn't count.    Do you, gal? SALLY (the woman thrown out from the wagon as they escaped from the pub mob) steps out of the shadows, puts her arms around NICK DR. PARNASSUS You're joking... toying with me. Like a cat with a mouse... As is your privilege.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sal didn't get to make a real choice. You were gaga. Out for the count. Wouldn't be fair...And you've got four, thanks to your friend Tony. So... we're even... it's not quite over. He smiles, lights a cigarette, takes a deep drag...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not quite. (checks his watch) Oh,oh, look at the time...it's 11. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 59   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Father? DR. PARNASSUS looks round to find VALENTINA standing next to him. He starts to round up the horses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Valentina... my darling girl. We must do another show! Now! Quickly! Get ready to move out!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who was that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somebody asking the way. Where's Tony?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I overheard you... He wasn't asking the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please! Get everybody together. Another show! Tony! Percy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to know what's going on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, now! I want to know the truth!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The truth?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you hiding?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are more important things, at this moment! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 59   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's something to do with that bloody rambling story you were telling me the night we found Tony isn't it? PARNASSUS sighs. Stops. He checks his watch
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So tell me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What I told you was... the truth. I really am thousands of years old. I have been immortal. I have been mortal. And I have had many dealings with the devil. Too many.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (fearful) What are you saying?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remember the woman I was telling you about?.. the one I was so desperately in love with.. so in love that I made a deal with the devil? That was your mother... ...she was so beautiful, so enchanting...so... Looking at VALENTINA, DR. PARNASSUS sees her morph into the BEAUTIFUL WOMAN appearing. He almost swoons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... so young. She was everything I had ever dreamed of. I made a choice. I bargained away my immortality. I regained my youth... and I won her. I did! I won her...! The BEAUTIFUL WOMAN morphs back into VALENTINA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...but at a price... DR. PARNASSUS looks haggard. He closes his eyes. He sways and loses his balance. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 59   CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What price?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (anguished) It's too terrible...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I... The price of my obsession... (he groans) I can't say it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Say it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was mortal again... on condition that... any children I fathered... would, on their sixteenth birthday... belong to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (stunned) Him?... VALENTINA can't take it in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But... didn't...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your mother never knew. She died before I had to tell her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't believe this! It can't be true. It's just another of your wretched stories... A cruel story!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If only... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 59   CONTINUED: (4)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do you say these things?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's true. Every word. But all is not lost. VALENTINA looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (feverishly) A new wager... The first of five. If I win... you're free... you're mine again.. and we can win! Where's Tony? We can still win!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: By playing games with the devil!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With one more show. The day isn't over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Valentina.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All my life you've made me play `Beauty', `Truth', `Justice'... filled my head with dreams and high ideals. All that crap! While... all the time...! The devil was right! You're arrogant! Vain and arrogant! I'm just another one of your stupid wagers!... You're beneath contempt. She rushes off into the dark night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Valentina! That's not true! It's not like that! Wait! Come back! Valentina! A dark silhouette stands in the shadow of the wagon. It's TONY. What has he heard?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 60   INT   THE WAGON     MOMENTS LATER                          60 DR. PARNASSUS rushes into the wagon. PERCY is already on his feet, having heard the DOCTOR shouting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's happened?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Valentina... She's... she's gone... ANTON rushes out. PERCY stops by DR. PARNASSUS before he exits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Telling the truth... Always a bad idea. 61   EXT   MONTAGE OF SCENES   NIGHT                            61 ANTON, running, calling for VALENTINA. PERCY is scouring the area on horseback. ANTON running though a newspaper-filled tip, sees a headline on one of the newspapers. Stops. 62   EXT   THE WAGON     A LITTLE LATER                         62 PARNASSUS, a bottle in his hand, is lurching around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You fool! You monstrous fool!    You should be dead. He starts to violently bang his head against the side of the wagon. Suddenly the stage begins to unfold. PARNASSUS looks up, unable to see what or who is doing this. He drunkenly stumbles around the side to see TONY pulling ropes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 62   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Saving Valentina.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?... How?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I overheard you. You only need one more to win. Me! I'll be that one. I'll take the risk to save Valentina and, hopefully, you sir. We've still got a few minutes. Tony steers DOCTOR PARNASSUS towards his glass column.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Yes! Of course! Of course! Thank God! Thank God!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How about thanking me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I expect nothing in return.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. You're a saint... A saint.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only Valentina's hand in marriage, if she'll have me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, my head...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And, as your son-in-law... perhaps... initiation into the secrets of the trance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! I can't do it! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 62   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But... (realizing Parnassus is referring to his inability to go into a trance) Why not?! What's wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My mind... I can't concentrate... I'm too upset...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must do it! You have to do it! It's the only way to save your daughter!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (distraught) I know...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sitting PARNASSUS down) Concentrate. You must concentrate. (clearing the way to the mirror) I'll make the right choice. I'm sure of it. I can feel how right it is already. TONY leaps back to steady DR. PARNASSUS who looked as though he were about to topple off his pillar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh God!... Doctor... We can save her.. you and me. I need this. We both need this. Please. The trance. PARNASSUS quiets down.   Starts mumbling. TONY rushes to the mirror. Steps through. He finds himself standing amongst the stage scenery. Nothing else.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bugger! He steps back out of the mirror.    Goes to PARNASSUS who is weeping.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's no good! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 62   CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !... Sir. Concentrate...or you'll have lost her forever. PARNASSUS slowly goes into a sobbing kind of trance state. TONY confirms he is in a trance, then rushes to the mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tony...oh, Tony.. What?! TONY stops. Looks around. There in the shadows huddles VALENTINA, sobbing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sobbing) It's useless... Hopeless... I thought I was strong, but I don't even know how to run away... TONY hesitates.. No time! He looks back to PARNASSUS who seems to still be in his trance. Hesitates. Then rushes to VALENTINA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's alright... it's alright... Don't cry. It's going to be alright, believe me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This stupid theatre...!... That's all I've ever known...! I've always believed it was something precious, but it's not... it's a lie...I hate it! TONY lifts her up, putting his arm around her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everything's going to be alright... I'll take you away. I'll show you the world. My world. The great big beautiful world I've always dreamed of... You'll love it. VALENTINA, grateful, clings to TONY. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 62   CONTINUED: (4)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon then. They turn to the mirror but, an off-stage clearing of the throat makes them look round to see ANTON watching them. He's holding a torn and dirty piece of newspaper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, there you are, Tony. Here's something m-might interest you. (reading) 'Missing: D-disgraced head of children's charity'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! TONY tries to snatch the paper but ANTON steps back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: N-not a bad p-picture, Tony. Listen to this Valentina... it's about Tony's b-beautiful world..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Valentina!     Where are you? PARNASSUS is still in his trance but, mumbling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Anthony Shepherd, who was arrested last week on charges of... VALENTINA is surrounded. Confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Valentina) Valentina, Don't listen to that. I'm innocent. This is the work of people who are trying to destroy me! Evil people! Believe me! Look, I'll show you the truth! TONY pulls VALENTINA towards the mirror. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 62   CONTINUED: (5)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (grabbing VALENTINA) Hurry! TONY and VALENTINA disappear through the mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sobbing in his trance) Valentina! Forgive me. 63   INT/EXT   DR. PARNASSUS' DRUNKEN IMAGINATION                 63 Mist and rain descend as TONY and VALENTINA run through the darkened shapes of the shampoo-commercial landscape - now tattered, ragged, and wind blown. Darkness reigns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This isn't right. This is all wrong. Which way? Soaked and cold they spy a welcome sight. A uniformed valet with an open umbrella stands by the door of a sleek limo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your car is here, Mr.Tony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, Lester, just in time. TONY ducks under the umbrella and helps VALENTINA into the car ahead of himself. As she slides across the seat she notices the driver - bowler hatted and smoking a cigarette.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Tony, don't get in! Get away! She pushes TONY back and scrambles out...dragging him back out into the dark rain. The driver turns around.   It's MR.NICK.. looking vexed. VALENTINA and TONY struggle through the rain. Suddenly, they find themselves in deep water up to their chests. They are sinking. Through the mist they see a boat. It is the gondola that transported the LOUIS VUITTON LADY. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 63   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Help! Over here! The boatman turns the boat in their direction. TONY tries to pull himself on board. The boatman reaches down to help.

And, like a repeat of that experience, from behind the ridge rises the Parnassus-faced Mongolfier balloon. But, now the eyes stream tears and rain pours down. In the basket is ANTON.

Someone can be heard unlatching the locks inside. A child's crying cuts through the wind. VALENTINA turns and sees a little girl sitting on the path... among flapping laundry. She rushes to her, tries to pick her up but, the little girl resists.. (CONTINUED)

direction.raw_text: Sustainability's great, if you can achieve it. The problem is, in many cases you simply can't, for a whole variety of reasons. direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, there's absolutely no need for that. That's just plain contrariness. VALENTINA tries to get around him. (CONTINUED)

direction.raw_text: . 68   CONTINUED: (4)

direction.raw_text: ...a selfish bitch, everyone I love dies...I'm...

PARNASSUS is sitting alone on a prominent bluff (the same one he tried throwing himself off many years ago) He's distraught. Tears run down this cheeks. A distant bell tolls midnight. A Tarot cards drops from his hand. It is The Hanged Man. MR. NICK points to the plain far below. Across the harsh ground, TONY is running for his life...pursued by the MOB.

direction.raw_text: I hope they get that bastard. Tear him limb from limb... But they won't... He leads a charmed life, that one... I've been trying to nail him for years... I thought I had him this time. But, there's always some prat comes to his rescue... Talk about the luck of the Devil. (he laughs) Those weird markings you found on him... on his forehead... Those satanic-symbol, so-called, things... What's all that about?... Maybe they protect him in some way... I've never been into that black-magic stuff myself... Can't seem to get the hang of it... I know, pathetic isn't it?... (CONTINUED)

direction.raw_text: . 69   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: God, I hate to see you like this. Look, I tell you what... If you can get the lowdown on those satanic markings, or.. wait.. better still, if you can wipe that self- righteous little creep off the face of the universe... I'll give you Valentina back. A beat. Below, the MOB is still in hot pursuit. TONY reaches the summit. In front of him, is his salvation - an empty gibbet. A noose hangs from the crossbeam.

direction.raw_text: Thank God for that! TONY relaxes a little. We can hear the mob now, struggling up the mountain. TONY digs into one of his pockets and pulls out the brass tube that he has always kept close. TONY opens his mouth and is about to slip the tube down his throat when he spots the Hanged Man Tarot card lying at his feet. A hand from behind him snatches the tube away. TONY, startled, turns to find himself looking up at DR. PARNASSUS. PARNASSUS is standing on a chair with the noose around his neck. He smiles and opens his hand. The metal tube has vanished. TONY panics. The MOB is getting closer. (CONTINUED)

direction.raw_text: . 70   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

He can't release her. And why not? Because he doesn't have her. He can't have her because she's the prize. (gaining confidence) He doesn't have five wins. But if you kill me he will, won't he? You'll have lost Valentina forever! DR. PARNASSUS does a double hand shuffle.

direction.raw_text: Choose. (CONTINUED)

At the same moment, the MOB resumes normal speed and roars up the mountain. Is PARNASSUS dead? Working very fast, TONY hoists him over his shoulder and wrestles the noose loose. He drops PARNASSUS on the ground. He's stunned but still alive. The MOB is closing in. TONY slaps DR. PARNASSUS hard between the shoulder blades. The tube pops out of the DOCTOR'S gullet. TONY catches it.

direction.raw_text: Gotcha! TONY swallows the tube as the MOB surge around the gibbet, grabbing him, beating him, and then lifting him onto the chair, tightening the noose around his neck. (CONTINUED)

PARNASSUS reaches a signpost which indicates two distinct paths. direction.raw_text: No, no, no... No more choices, please... No more choices...!!! Enraged, he tries to push the sign over, but is too feeble. Exhausted, he subsides onto a smooth protruding stone.

PARNASSUS up the drive of a suburban bungalow, past a perfect lawn and double garage, to the front door. PERCY rings the bell. DR. PARNASSUS tries to make a run for it but PERCY holds him fast. dialogue.raw_text: . PARNASSUS is hanging by his coat, snagged on a branch angled out from the cliff face and held, like a fishing rod, by MR NICK who has a great grin on his face. 24   EXT.   RIVER

dialogue.raw_text: Lightning flashes again. We see what ANTON and VALENTINA see. A shadow, on the water, of someone `dancing', hung by his neck with a rope attached to the underside of the bridge.

dialogue.raw_text: shoots PERCY and VALENTINA a jaundiced look and with VALENTINA'S help on her end of the rope begins to swing back and forth. Eventually, with a big enough swing, he manages to hook his foot around the HANGING MAN who has gone limp. Dead. With extreme difficulty and great discomfort, ANTON pulls the MAN close to him, takes a knife from his pocket and cuts the MAN'S rope. ANTON and the MAN are now swinging back and forth together on ANTON'S rope which is threatening to cut ANTON in half.

result.heading: THE LADDER COMPLETELY SEPARATES IN TWO

dialogue.raw_text: Reaching the base of TONY'S ladder, the RUSSIANS start climbing. Seeing the threat, TONY kicks hard and breaks the rungs below him.. setting off a domino effect with more rungs breaking downward towards the RUSSIANS. Snap! Crack! Rungs break in their grasp.. they fall. The RUSSIANS land in a tangled heap as the domino effect continues down to the base of the ladder. Laughing down at them, TONY turns to continue climbing - only to see the domino effect heading down from the top of the ladder... towards him. THE LADDER COMPLETELY SEPARATES IN TWO. Tony struggles to maintain his balance - and somehow manages to get his feet on the two halves of a broken rung. Then, as if he were on giant stilts, starts to stride away. The RUSSIANS chase after him but, his giant strides leave them far behind. Smugly, TONY looks back just as one of the legs of his ladder snags on a fallen log. He loses his balance... and plunges hundreds of feet earthward. From nowhere, ANTON (still dressed as a fat woman) appears.. running to catch the plummeting TONY. He does and Whomp!!.. is flattened. Knocked out cold. TONY is unscathed.. his fall broken by ANTON'S padding. But, the RUSSIANS arrive, grab TONY, start to beat him up.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The RUSSIANS turn and, thinking ANTON is a fat, bossy, middle- aged woman, hesitate.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ...and he wanders off into the darkness with SALLY. Somewhere, a clock strikes 11. DR. PARNASSUS, agitated, watches him go.

result.heading: BUSINESS PEOPLE, POLITICIANS, POP STARS, CELEBS

dialogue.raw_text: They see a speck in the sky, it's the PRIME MINISTER'S approaching helicopter... TONY and the posse of JOURNALISTS and PHOTOGRAPHERS rush off leaving VALENTINA standing alone. 65   EXT   HELICOPTER LANDING PAD DAY                             65 The PRIME MINISTER and his WIFE get out of the helicopter, followed by their AIDES. TONY and the PRIME MINISTER shake hands for THE TV CAMERAS. VALENTINA watches from a distance..ignored. 66   INT   BALLROOM   NIGHT                                       66 A huge chandelier illuminates a grand ornate ballroom where wealthy guests, in evening dress, are being seated at tables by liveried ushers. Large beautiful photographs of the underprivileged children of the world line the walls. A great banner reads "Suffer The Little Children Benefit Ball" The PRIME MINISTER and his WIFE are seated at the head table, facing the dais, bubbly and expectant. Security is heavy. 67   INT   ENTRANCE HALL   NIGHT                                  67 TONY is conferring with his speech writers and assistants as VALENTINA descends the staircase looking utterly stunning in a beautiful gown. TONY bows, romantically kissing her hand. He turns her to admire their reflections in a gilt mirror...the perfect, beautiful, dream couple.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: looks up and freezes. At the same time the walls of the ballroom begin to crack and disintegrate. TONY'S world starts to fall apart... literally. The floor around TONY falls away into an abyss leaving only a narrow escape route. He hurls ANTON aside and dashes away as the GUESTS pursue him. ANTON avoids being trampled but, loses his footing and falls over the edge.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: ANTON REVERTS TO HIS NORMAL SIZE

dialogue.raw_text: They turn to see PARNASSUS in the distance (where once the ballroom stood) stumbling towards them, drunk, desperate. As he moves forward a new landscape is created behind him. TONY rushes towards PARNASSUS.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ignores him, sunk even deeper into despondency.

dialogue.raw_text: With his other hand DR. PARNASSUS produces the tube from TONY'S ear.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Although battered, TONY winks smugly at DR. PARNASSUS, but his mood changes when he sees DR. PARNASSUS spit out several more fake tubes, then, gagging, force the real one up and out of his gullet. With a look of realization and horror, TONY drops to his death as the MOB kicks the chair away from under him. The MOB cheers. Yes, he's dead. DR. PARNASSUS tosses the metal tube to MR NICK who steps coolly out of the MOB, cigarette in his mouth.
